scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run prisma:generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up && sleep 3 && npm run db:setup
scripts.start: npm run docker:up && sleep 2 && npm run dev
